climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: The Magic Keyboard is the perfect companion for iPad Pro, now available in two colors.
It features a comfortable, responsive typing experience, a trackpad that opens up new ways to work, a USB-C port for charging, backlit keys, and front and back protection.
With a floating cantilever design, iPad Pro attaches magnetically and allows you to smoothly adjust to the perfect viewing angle.
Compatibility: iPad Pro 12.9-inch (3rd generation or later)
body.description: The Magic Keyboard is the perfect companion for iPad Pro (3rd, 4th, 5th, and 6th Generation), now available in two colors. It features a comfortable, responsive typing experience, a trackpad that opens up new ways to work, a USB-C port for charging, backlit keys, and front and back protection. With a floating cantilever design, iPad Pro attaches magnetically and allows you to smoothly adjust to the perfect viewing angle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product as described!
reviews.reviewText: I think the Magic Keyboard is overpriced new, and I just couldn’t bring myself to purchase it new for the extent I’d use it. I was a doubter on buying a renewed/used product, but after reading the reviews of many others, I went pulled the trigger and decided to take a chance on one. The item arrived quickly, was in perfect condition, and works really great. The Magic Keyboard is a great accessory, but even now having one, I would’ve still had a hard time spending nearly twice as much new as I did on the refurbished one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent condition and works perfectly
reviews.reviewText: Recently my keyboard that I bought in 2021 from Best Buy has not been connecting at times and stop working in the middle of using it. It can be a shortage of battery, I don’t know since we can’t tell the battery life in the keyboards. I ordered a replacement for my keyboard from Amazon on 11/24/23. The keyboard was in great condition and appeared to be perfect. However, to notice 3 buttons was not working on the replacement keyboard, the (M) (,) and (.) keys were not working. I started a replacement of this item on 11/28/23 and was given an ETA for delivery for 12/1/23. Lucky me, I got a surprise notification saying my item will be arriving earlier than expected. I got my replacement of my Amazon order on 11/30/23. Let me say….. “Around of Applause” this merchant shipped the item fast and sent an item that is dang near brand new. The Apple box has slight dirty marks, not bothersome and I wiped it with a Clorox wipe for any germs. Then, upon opening the box, the product was wrapped in the frosted film like a new product would be. It included the apple literature, but without the Apple stickers..whomp whomp!!! Can’t have it all for a “Renewed” item. But hey….We are in the game. Per the pictures, the item is free of damages and stains and works like new. Strange moment, it even smells new. Hahahaha. I connected my iPad Pro with no issues and did a test type of all characters on the keyboard and they ALL work… I wiped down the exterior and keys with a bleach wipe and lightly mist the entire keyboard with Lysol spray, the Air version for protection from germs since I am not the original owner. I will definitely order from this merchant again, if need to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing magic keyboard!!!.
reviews.reviewText: When I opened the box, I was thrilled to see that it looked brand new. So far, everything is going well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Keyboard I've Owned By Far.
reviews.reviewText: I have yet to buy an Apple product that I didn't think was brilliantly designed. This keyboard falls well into that category. Installation is as simple as it gets since it's magnetic. It holds my iPad Pro with aplomb, as it should and sets it just the way I would when I use my MacBook Air. Of course, the keyboard and track pad are ultra responsive. It all feels like a premium product, as it should. Don't settle for the cheaper versions of this if you have the option. It's worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I don't ever write reviews but I feel like I should for this keyboard case. I never buy refurbished/renewed tech but I didn't feel like paying retail for a new Magic Keyboard for my iPad Pro. So I took a gamble on this.It came with the original box, packaging, and documents. The box was a bit damaged but nothing terrible. I was pleasantly surprised by how clean the Magic Keyboard was and it definitely looked like new. As soon as I connected my iPad Pro to it, it started working without issues.A few months after using it, I still have no issues with any of the keys, trackpad, or connectivity. I highly recommend getting this renewed as it saves a lot of money compared to buying it new from Apple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Like new for half the price
reviews.reviewText: I’ve wanted to get a Magic Keyboard for my iPad Pro for a while but I just couldn’t get behind paying $300 for one. I got excited when I found these “renewed” ones for half the price. I don’t think the one I received was ever used. It was listed as “excellent” condition but I was still expecting to see some minor signs of use. I’d recommend getting one of these to anyone who is looking for one at a good price. I did take away a star because as great of a keyboard as it is I’m not a fan with how much the iPad hangs over the keyboard. I end up bumping it a lot with my fingers. I’m hoping this will stop as I get used to the form factor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A believer in renewed
reviews.reviewText: I am normally a little nervous buying used electronics but I got this keyboard today and its flawless. Came in the original box which was a little dingy. Seeing this I was worried but when I took the keyboard out it was pristine. Hooked it up and away I went. There are reasons Apple products are the best to go with things like the iPad. They’re simply the best. Buy renewed. This keyboard, in white, was $184 cheaper than Apple sells it for new.No real knocks on it. It is a little heavy which may bug some people, and if you angle it all the way back, you’re almost typing underneath the iPad when using the number row. The iPad is held on by a magnet, which is extremely strong so there is no worry about it falling off. The floating design is cool and the pass through charging is very handy as it does cause some battery drain, seeing how the iPad powers the keyboard. Trackpad is very responsive. The cursor was very fast but you can set it to slow it down which I did. I also set it to tap to click instead it actually pushing down on the trackpad. Lots of options to play with and you can program your own shortcuts.All in all its fabulous. Buy it renewed.

So glad I didn't buy new. The keyboard I got was basically brand new. No marks on it whatsoever. The only indication of it every being used was the cologne smell on it, lol. Very happy with the purchase, saved $200! Great keyboard feel, and the trackpad is excellent, on par with a macbook pro. The thing can be a little top-heavy and I'm still figuring out the best way to unfold the thing, but overall very pleased. At $270 its great value.
Inmejorable! Funciona perfectamente y por el precio es una ganga. Llegó como nuevo. Lo recomiendo ampliamente.

I love this product a lot, it’s a perfect companion to the iPad Pro! I’m also surprised to find out that this renewed Magic Keyboard was barely used and pretty much brand new. So not only did I save a ton of money buying this, I got a perfect product that works exactly like a brand new one. I totally recommend this to anyone who wants to buy a Magic Keyboard but just can’t justify the original price!

The media could not be loaded. Desde hace mucho tiempo deseaba comprar este teclado para sacarle mucho más provecho a mi iPad, pero tenía miedo de pedir uno refabricado a pesar de que mi experiencia con estos ha sido muy buena. Después de pensarlo mucho me animé a pedirlo y no me arrepiento nada. Si la caja no llegara abierta podría jurar que es nuevo. Llegó en perfectas condiciones y es una gozada trabajar con el.Usar el magic keyboard con el iPad hace que se vuelva una experiencia más completa y mejora la productividad en un 100%. Las teclas se sienten como las de una laptop de gama alta. Los ángulos de visión que te permite el producto son más que suficientes. La retroiluminación de las teclas es muy útil y funciona de forma muy natural dependiendo de las condiciones de luz en las que te encuentres. El trackpad parece pequeño a primera vista pero una vez que comienzas a utilizarlo te das cuenta de que es perfecto, funciona con todos los gestos del de una macbook y te acostumbras super rápido a aprovecharlos.En resumen es un gran producto, si lo compras estoy segura de que te va a encantar sin importar el color que elijas.

Valió 100% la pena, tenía miedo de arriesgarme y que me llegara dañado o feo, llego Perfecto, parece prácticamente nuevo; excelente calidad, excelente estética y por la mitad de lo que cuesta el nuevo nuevo, WOW 100% recomendado💓
